name: preload-test
description: This package tests a case when iconv-lite sources are not available after initial require() happens, thus necessitating using preloadCodecsAndData() function

scripts.!note1: NOTE: We do `npm pack` of the main iconv-lite package followed by installing it to create a copy of the package (not symlink).
scripts.!note2: This is needed because we can't reproduce the problematic case with just symlinks because node uses fully resolved file names to cache modules.
